message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm confident it's worth at least $800000 to me, and I'm willing to part with it for a price that I believe is fair for both of us. I'm offering you a chance to acquire it for $900000. This is a limited-time offer, so if you're interested, let me know as soon as possible.
